attributes.action: Change laws to prevent sewage dumping into rivers.
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to act on this as many of these organisations will not respond to local voices. By adding a punishment we can hopefully reduce the number of accidents.
attributes.background:
To  put a ban on sewage dumping. 
 To put in harsher punishments for organisations who may ignore laws which are already in place 
for the government to help clean rivers effected by the dumping of sewage or any substance which will effect the health of the river and its local ecosystem

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622551
